name: Automate Collect and Noitify Wocommerce Order

parameters.content:
## Collect Woocommerce Order

- **Set up your webhook URL in WooCommerce** to send order updates to n8n.
- **All order statuses ("PROCESSING", "PENDING", "CANCEL")** are sent as notifications to Discord.
- **Only "PROCESSING" orders** (already paid) are also appended to Google Sheets for tracking.
- **"PENDING" or "CANCEL" orders** are not logged in the sheet, only notified on Discord.

## Getting Credentials

### 1. Discord Bot Token
- Visit the [Discord Developer Portal](https://discord.com/developers/applications).
- Create a new application and add a bot.
- Copy your bot token and enter it in n8nâ€™s Discord node credentials.

### 2. Google Sheets OAuth2
- Go to the [Google Cloud Console](https://console.cloud.google.com/).
- Create a new project and enable the Google Sheets API.
- Set up the OAuth consent screen and create OAuth credentials.
- Download your credentials and add them to n8nâ€™s Google Sheets node.
- Authenticate with your Google account when prompted.

### 3. WooCommerce Webhook
- In WooCommerce admin, go to **Settings > Advanced > Webhooks**.
- Add a new webhook and set the delivery URL to your n8n webhook endpoint.
- Select the event type (e.g., Order Updated) and activate the webhook.

**Note:** Test all credentials in n8n to ensure proper connection before using the workflow.
